Caitlin bedding set

Bring a breath of fresh air to up to 4 rooms with this collection featuring summery colours and prints. Super soft and light, the breathable microfibre polyester fabric is perfect for snuggling, no matter the weather. Don’t miss the matching fitted bedcover set, which is available only in the larger sets.

Product code: 821767
